dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset consists of a large number of images captured from a car driving through urban areas, providing pixel-wise semantic ground truth. It is used for training and evaluation of building extraction methods.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Nex
M. Gerke
F. Remondino
H. Przybilla
M. BÃ¤umker
A. Zurhorst
dcterms:description: The ISPRS Dortmund-Zeche-Zollern dataset consists of few large images captured from nadir and oblique viewpoints, which have been annotated for building detection. It is used for training and evaluation of building extraction methods.
dcterms:title: ISPRS Dortmund-Zeche-Zollern

dcterms:description: The GoogleEarth dataset is a semi-synthetic dataset generated from GoogleEarth scenes, rendered from different viewpoints to evaluate building detection performance.
dcterms:title: GoogleEarth Dataset

dcterms:description: The own dataset consists of images captured with a DJI Phantom 3 drone, demonstrating local image-based depth estimation for a single building.
dcterms:title: Own Dataset (captured with DJI Phantom 3)
